text: Henryk Petrich (born January 10, 1959 in Łódź, Łódź Voivodeship) is a former Polish amateur boxer, who won the Light Heavyweight bronze medal at the 1988 Seoul Olympic games. Petrich also won bronze medal at the 1986 World Championships in Reno and silver medal at the 1987 European Championships in Turin.
